name: atomic-blueprintlib
description: A framework for using blueprints to generate Atomic game objects.

scripts.prebuild: shx cp node_modules/entity-blueprint-manager/typings/ambient/*.d.ts typings/entity-blueprint-manager && tsc && npm run decl
scripts.postbuild: npm run buildplugin && npm run docs
scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs ts/*.ts node_modules/entity-blueprint-manager/**/*.ts typings/**/*.ts --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --mode file --theme minimal --readme none --name 'Atomic Blueprint Library'

author: T. Shaddock Heath
